The ext-* in require-dev are needed for php_codesniffer to work. See https://github.com/squizlabs/PHP_CodeSniffer/wiki/Requirements for more.
To install SimpleXML PHP extension for PHP 8.1 on Ubuntu, run `sudo apt-get install php8.1-simplexml`.
The start script uses & to start up Docker container in background else Composer will timeout while waiting for it to complete.
scripts.build: scripts/version.sh && DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 BUILDKIT_PROGRESS=plain docker build --tag getmail:dev --tag getmail:$(cat VERSION.txt) --no-cache .
